reviews.review: is good

One of the best games ever made, Portal 2 is a worthy follow-up to the fantastic original Portal game and is a fully-fledged full-length story with a set of unique, hilarious characters and an engaging dark comedy tale. Puzzle gameplay has never been so immersive or atmospheric - this is Valve at their finest. Must-play.

This was a triumph of game design. The humour, the atmosphere, the gameplay... each of these combine to make one huge success. It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Memes aside, it's hard to find anything that's quite this much of a joy to play nowadays. My only wish is that we can one day get some kind of continuation.

This game is incredible.
With mind-bending puzzles and a hilarious all star cast, portal 2 is sure to be the best game to keep you engaged with the story whilst intriguing levels of pure madness.
It definitely fits well within valve's most critically acclaimed game and well thought out storyline.
The enjoyment of this game is lived up to its predecessor, I dare even say it beats it.
The community's creation of custom levels within the workshop always presents creative minds that go rather unnoticed by the general community and portal 2 lets them show their skills out to the full.
10/10 valve! (Count to 3 please!)

Portal 2 is that game you can play for the rest of your life and never get bored, due to the community made maps using the in-game Perpetual Testing Initiative. While Portal 1's first playthrough experience was a true masterpiece, Portal 2 in all its flaws, it's still better as a full game, it's better looking and much longer. I may hate the Personality core Wheatley, I still love Portal 2's story and how they used every possible aspect of Aperture Science's Test Chambers. 10/10!
